name: mris_fwhm
description: Smooths surface data and/or estimates FWHM

inputs.name: Input File
inputs.description: Input data file.

inputs.name: Subject
inputs.description: Subject whose surface the input is defined on.

inputs.name: Hemisphere
inputs.description: Hemifield that the input is defined on. Legal values are lh and rh.

inputs.name: Surface
inputs.description: Surface name to compute AR1 on. Default is white.

inputs.name: Label File
inputs.description: Label file to be used as a mask.

inputs.name: Cortex Flag
inputs.description: Use hemi.cortex.label as a mask.

inputs.name: Mask File
inputs.description: Mask file. Compute AR1 only over voxels in the given mask.

inputs.name: Detrending Matrix
inputs.description: Detrend data with the matrix in x.mat.

inputs.name: Detrend Order
inputs.description: Order of polynomial detrending.

inputs.name: Smooth Only Flag
inputs.description: Only smooth the data, implies --no-detrend.

inputs.name: No Detrend Flag
inputs.description: Turn off polynomial detrending.

inputs.name: Square Input Flag
inputs.description: Compute square of input before smoothing.

inputs.name: Sum File
inputs.description: Prints ascii summary to sumfile.

inputs.name: Dat File
inputs.description: File for FWHM data.

inputs.name: AR1 Data File
inputs.description: File containing ar1mean and ar1std.

inputs.name: AR1 Volume
inputs.description: Save spatial AR1 as an overlay.

inputs.name: FWHM Map
inputs.description: Save vertex-wise spatial FWHM as an overlay.

inputs.name: Prune Flag
inputs.description: Remove any voxel that is zero in any subject (after any inversion).

inputs.name: No Prune Flag
inputs.description: Do not prune (default).

inputs.name: Out Mask
inputs.description: File to save the final mask.

inputs.name: Variance Normalize Flag
inputs.description: Normalize the variance across space within any mask.

inputs.name: FWHM Value
inputs.description: Smooth input by the specified FWHM in mm.

inputs.name: Niters Only
inputs.description: File that reports the number of iterations needed to achieve the specified FWHM.

inputs.name: Output File
inputs.description: Output file to save the processed data.

inputs.name: Subjects Directory
inputs.description: Subjects directory.

inputs.name: Synthesize Input Flag
inputs.description: Synthesize input with white gaussian noise.

inputs.name: Number of Synth Frames
inputs.description: Number of frames for synthesized input.

inputs.name: Number of Threads
inputs.description: Number of threads to use.

inputs.name: Debug Flag
inputs.description: Turn on debugging.

inputs.name: Check Options Flag
inputs.description: Don't run anything, just check options and exit.

inputs.name: Version Flag
inputs.description: Print out version and exit.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
